channel.title: Akshata Mohanty | Software Engineer
channel.description: This is my personal blog, where I write about technology, books and other odd things.

item.title: Preparing for the Google Cloud Associate Engineer Exam
item.description: What is the Google Cloud Associate Enginer exam about and how to ace it? It's not cramming!

item.title: AI for Non-PhDs - AI Superpowers for your apps in 30 minutes
item.description: AI is everywhere! The possibilities are endless. And with libraries like Tensorflow and Pytorch, AI is now accessible to developers like you and me, without needing years in a PhD. In this talk, we learn how to build a dog breed classifer and deploy it as a web and mobile app. And all of this, without a server!

item.title: `How Google Works` by Eric Schimdt & Jon Rosenberg
item.description: My key take-aways from this wonderful insight into the culture of Google

item.title: batch-mailer
item.description: plugin for google spreadsheets to send customized batch emails based on templates built in google docs

item.title: client-ai templates
item.description: templates and workflow for developing for client-only ai apps using tensorflow-js and tensorflow-lite
